com.phunware.locationmessaging.messages

Interface MessageManager


  • public interface MessageManager
    MessageManager provides a means to manage Messages. You can also supply a MessageListener to be notified of message related events.

    To receive message events when your Activity is in the foreground, or to perform actions like updating the application UI or displaying additional information, add a MessageListener via the addMessageListener(MessageListener) method. Note that you must also remove the listener via removeMessageListener(MessageListener) to avoid leaks.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMessageListener(MessageListener listener)
      Add a MessageListener to receive events for a Message Be sure to remove the listener when it is no longer needed using removeMessageListener(MessageListener)
      void getMessage(Long id, Callback<Message> callback)
      Retrieves a specific message from the database via it's id.
      void getMessages(Callback<List<Message>> callback)
      Retrieves undeleted Messages from the local database.
      void getUnreadMessages(Callback<List<Message>> callback)
      Retrieves all unread Messages from the local database.
      void removeMessageListener(MessageListener listener)
      Remove a MessageListener from the MessageManager.
      void setMessageDeleted(Long campaignId, Callback<Void> callback)
      Removes the Message from the local database.
      void setMessageRead(Long campaignId, Callback<Message> callback)
      Sets the Message as read, and submits a MESSAGE_IMPRESSION event to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • addMessageListener

        void addMessageListener(MessageListener listener)
        Add a MessageListener to receive events for a Message Be sure to remove the listener when it is no longer needed using removeMessageListener(MessageListener)
        Parameters:
        listener - The MessageListener to be notified of message events.
        See Also:
        removeMessageListener(MessageListener)

      • removeMessageListener

        void removeMessageListener(MessageListener listener)
        Remove a MessageListener from the MessageManager.
        Parameters:
        listener - The MessageListener to remove.

      • getMessages

        void getMessages(Callback<List<Message>> callback)
        Retrieves undeleted Messages from the local database.

      • getUnreadMessages

        void getUnreadMessages(Callback<List<Message>> callback)
        Retrieves all unread Messages from the local database.

      • getMessage

        void getMessage(Long id,
                Callback<Message> callback)
        Retrieves a specific message from the database via it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the message.
        callback - A callback to handle the found message.

      • setMessageDeleted

        void setMessageDeleted(Long campaignId,
                       Callback<Void> callback)
        Removes the Message from the local database. The result will be the message or an error if something went wrong.
        Parameters:
        campaignId - The id of the message to be deleted.
        callback - A callback to handle the found message.

      • setMessageRead

        void setMessageRead(Long campaignId,
                    Callback<Message> callback)
        Sets the Message as read, and submits a MESSAGE_IMPRESSION event to the server.
        Parameters:
        campaignId - The id of the message to be marked as read.
        callback - A callback to handle the found message.
